| **Job Title** | Factory Cleaner | **Department:** | Administration |
| **Incumbent** |  | **Reports to:** | Systems Co-ordinator |
| **Date** |  |  |  |

Position Overview

* Ensure Factory, Offices and Environs are cleaned in accordance with BRCGS requirements

Essential Job Functions

* Monday mornings put out, collect and wash wheelie bins W
* Tea/Coffee - Times: 8.30, 10.30 and 12.30 and 15.00 D
* Check stock levels of tea, coffee, sugar and milk W
* Check stock levels of cleaning materials W
* Check toilet paper and hand towels in all toilets D
* Clean toilets according to BRCGS D
* Empty waste paper baskets D
* Polish furniture D
* Sweep and mop floors in office and factory D
* Vacuum the carpets W
* Sweep atrium D
* Pick up cigarette stompies and sweep outside entrance D
* Fill in BRCGS cleaning schedules D
* Collect laundry from wash basket in changing rooms and hand in for

for washing BW

* Ensure kitchen /canteen/waste paper baskets/

coffee cups are clean before leaving D

* Wash and vacuum cars on Monday afternoons W
* Wash windows M
* Wipe down walls M
* Dust finished goods and raw materials storage areas W
* Dust window sills and ledges in offices and factory W
* Assist Spout Operator WN
* Report any non-conformities i.e foreign objects, insect sightings, WN

broken glass etc.

* General duties WN

D = Daily W = Weekly M = Monthly WN = When Necessary

Requirements

* Literate
* Exposure to cleaning portfolio

Other Skills/Abilities

* Attention to detail

Employee Manager
